attributes.action: Make landlords suspend rent if tenant is unable to work due to coronavirus
attributes.additional_details:
Hard times are ahead of us. This virus and its consequences affect all of us and soon many of us won't be able to work and make a living. 
Rent is one of the biggest expenses for most families and not everyone has enough savings to survive this period. I kindly ask the government to order landlords and home owners to pause the rent for the next couple of months.
attributes.background: Make landlords suspend rent if tenant is unable to work due to coronavirus
